name: Content Security Policy Level 2
description: Mitigate cross-site scripting attacks by only allowing certain sources of script, style, and other resources. CSP 2 adds hash-source, nonce-source, and five new directives

links.title: MDN Web Docs - Content Security Policy

byNum.1: Firefox 31-34 is missing the child-src, frame-ancestors, base-uri, and form-action directives.
byNum.2: Firefox 35 is missing the child-src, frame-ancestors, and form-action directives.
byNum.3: Firefox 36-44 is missing the child-src directives.
byNum.4: Chrome 36-38 & Opera 23-25 are missing the child-src, frame-ancestors, base-uri, and form-action directives.
byNum.5: Chrome 39 and Opera 26 are missing the child-src, base-uri, and form-action directives.
byNum.6: Edge has broken nonce support as it ignores nonces on sourced scripts.
